title: bangAru kAmAkSi
sahitya:
bangAru kAmAkSi bhaktan mantra siddhan paradEvi mahimaiyaip-pADum varaprasAdi shyAmA shAstri


anupallavi

  sangIta vANi aruL pongum vidyAdharan dAna dahana jatisvara shruti laya naipuNyan


caraNam    selvarai nADAda selvak-kalai mannan serukkarin garuvattai segukkum vitpannan
nallisai vANarellAm shollum pulavanAm nAda shikhara jyOti bharata shAstra nidhi
